;

;More than 1,100 medical staff took the initiative to surrender and explain the problems. More than 1,200 people were dealt with. The medical system of Yibin City, Sichuan collapsed. The issue of sexual corruption was exposed and attracted attention.

;

;On October 8, Nandu reporters found that since this year, many leaders of the city’s medical system have been investigated, and a number of corruption cases have been disclosed, most of which are “top leaders.” It was exposed that staff at all levels in the hospital took kickbacks, patients transferred surgery fees to the head nurse, and department heads threatened to resign to demand a larger share of the stolen money.

;

;Not only Yibin, but corruption cases in the medical field in Neijiang, Deyang and other places in Sichuan are also shocking. The director of a county hospital even "shares shares in the inpatient building under construction" and charges handling fees for "saying hello" for hospital purchases. Regardless of the amount or the amount of property, he will accept the entire order, and the total amount of money collected in violation of disciplines and laws has reached 20.1209 million. Yuan.

;

;;;

;Jiang Huashan, former Party Secretary and President of Yibin Sixth People’s Hospital.

;

;;The patient transferred the surgery fee to the head nurse, leading to the "top leader" to take the lead in corruption;

;

;On October 8, Nandu reporters combed through the Yibin City Discipline Inspection and Supervision Commission's disclosure The report found that since this year, many leaders in the city’s medical system have been investigated successively, including Zhang Xianjiang, Party branch secretary of Pingshan County Traditional Chinese Medicine Hospital, Zhao Zhengbing, Party secretary of Gongxian People’s Hospital, Long Haibing, Party secretary of Yibin Second Traditional Chinese Medicine Hospital, Yibin City Shi Jun, the former Party Secretary of the Fifth People's Hospital, and others, most of whom are "top leaders."

;

;On September 15, the "Integrity Sichuan" WeChat public account released "Strictly Investigate Medical "Corpse"", revealing the centralized rectification process of corruption in the medical field in Yibin City, exposing the corruption of many former hospital directors. Rotten details.

;

;In June 2022, the First Inspection Team of the Xuzhou District Committee of Yibin City received a letter of complaint while inspecting the Sixth People’s Hospital of Yibin City. The informant reported that after the urology department of the hospital performed an operation on the patient, the patient directly transferred the operation fee to the head nurse instead of paying through the hospital window.

;

;After receiving clues from the inspection team, the task force of the Xuzhou District Discipline Inspection and Supervision Committee conducted an investigation into the Department of Urology and quickly determined that this was the order of Luo Xiance, the director of the department. However, Luo Xiance did not realize the seriousness of the problem. When the investigation team first talked to him, he explained the problems of the department's private treasury and accepting drug kickbacks, and said, "If the worst happens, I will refund the money."

;

;After Luo Xiance was investigated, the disciplinary and illegal violations of Jiang Huashan, the party secretary of the hospital, also surfaced. According to the investigators of the task force, "Following the clues of medical representatives returning kickbacks to hospital public officials, we dug into the issue of Jiang Huashan, the party secretary of the hospital, who was suspected of accepting bribes, and took measures to detain him."

;

; After investigation, Jiang Huashan took advantage of his position as Secretary of the Party Committee and President of the Sixth Hospital to open accounts in the hospital for relevant companies, and provided services to more than 10 pharmaceutical companies in the introduction and sales of drugs, equipment, and consumables, construction of engineering projects, and payment collection. The representatives provided help, and the amount of bribes they received was as high as more than 6 million yuan, and the medical representatives obtained improper benefits of more than 30 million yuan.

;

;Driven by Jiang Huashan’s corruption and the interests of high kickbacks, corruption has become common within Yibin Sixth People’s Hospital. A small number of hospital managers did not care about medical skills, and once only wanted to make money. There was even a ridiculous phenomenon in which the deputy director of the department passively sabotaged his work when the rebates for consumables were unevenly distributed, and used the excuse of resignation to force the director to share more of the stolen money.

;

;Under the strong shock of the serious disciplinary and illegal cases of Jiang Huashan and Luo Xiance, the Yibin Municipal Commission for Discipline Inspection and Supervision also launched simultaneous educational warnings throughout the city. As of August this year, through in-depth and meticulous ideological and political work, more than 1,100 medical staff in Yibin City have voluntarily surrendered or clarified their problems.

;

;;Staff at all levels of the hospital collected kickbacks, and unscrupulous drug dealers were used to get through them at all levels;

;

;The corruption case at Yibin Sixth People's Hospital is not an isolated case.

;

;On July 6 this year, according to the "Integrity Yibin" report, Xie Mingjun, former Party Secretary and President of Yibin First People's Hospital, was expelled from the Party for serious violations of discipline and law; former Party Committee member of Yibin First People's Hospital, Vice President Yang Li seriously violated discipline and law and was expelled from the party and public office.

;

;Soon after, the confession videos of Xie Mingjun and Yang Li sparked heated discussions on social platforms. In the video, Xie Mingjun cried: "I hate myself and have done a lot of ridiculous things. What do I need so much money for?" Yang Li also cried bitterly: "How can I support myself after being released from prison after more than ten years?";

;According to the "Integrity Sichuan" WeChat public account, Xie Mingjun went from director of general surgery to model dean, national second-level professor, and academic expert. When faced with unscrupulous businessmen coming from all directions, he did not resist the temptation. Start accepting "rebates" and "favorable fees" from drug dealers and equipment manufacturers.

;

;In the Yibin First People's Hospital, hospital leaders, pharmaceutical committees, pharmacy departments, departments and medical staff were infiltrated by unscrupulous drug dealers and purchased drugs with kickbacks. Bribery payments generally reached 30% of the drug price, up to 50%.

;

;The relevant person in charge of the Yibin Municipal Commission for Discipline Inspection and Supervision pointed out that this case not only exposed the loopholes in the internal supervision and management of Yibin First People's Hospital and the construction of medical ethics and medical ethics, but also exposed the problems in the city's medical system. Common problems existing in the supervision and management of centralized drug procurement.

;

;After Xie Mingjun was detained, Shi Jun, the retired former party secretary and president of the Fifth People’s Hospital of Yibin, also failed to escape investigation.

;

;According to his confession, during his 23 years in office, he took advantage of his position, accepted various bribes, and used ill-gotten gains to purchase 8 cars and 7 properties, including a Porsche Cayenne, a Mercedes-Benz S300, Touareg has real estate mainly in Sichuan, Yunnan, Hainan and other places, and has about 6 million yuan in cash.

;

;From serving as the dean in 1999 to retiring to the second line in 2021, Shi Jun has firmly grasped the full say in the hospital's commercial procurement, personnel appointments and dismissals, infrastructure, etc., and cultivated confidants in key positions to ensure smooth communication. A channel through which power can be realized. The "paternalistic" style has already eroded the rules and regulations to pieces, making the hospital management and employees surrender to them, and internal supervision is completely out of control.

;

;According to the "Integrity Outlook" report, Yibin City has detained 13 public officials, including 3 county-level cadres, including 11 "top leaders", and used "four forms" to deal with more than 1,200 people .

;

;;The dean of the county hospital’s under-construction inpatient buildings has been “taken as a shareholder and receive dividends”;

;

;In addition to Yibin, there are also corruption cases in the medical field in Neijiang, Deyang and other places in Sichuan Equally shocking.  

;

;Since July last year, Neijiang Municipal Commission for Discipline Inspection and Supervision has successively reported and exposed Liu Yu, the former Party Secretary of Dongxing District People’s Hospital of Neijiang City, Liu Xiaoping, the former director of Zizhong County Traditional Chinese Medicine Hospital, and the former Longchang Municipal People’s Hospital. Zhang Zongming and others were expelled from the party and public offices for serious violations of discipline and law.  

;

;In April 2022, the Neijiang Municipal Commission for Discipline Inspection and Supervision received clues about Zhang Zongming, the former director of Longchang Municipal People’s Hospital, regarding disciplinary and illegal violations. In view of the large number of projects in the medical and health system, the large amounts involved, and the complex local relationship network Regarding the situation, the Discipline Inspection and Supervision Commissions of Neijiang City and Dongxing District simultaneously intervened in the investigation and found that the amount involved in the case by Zhang Zongming amounted to more than 15 million yuan. In October of the same year, Zhang Zongming was expelled from the party and public office for serious violations of discipline and law. He was sentenced to ten years and nine months in prison by the Dongxing District People's Court for accepting bribes.  

;

;Recently, the "Integrity Sichuan" WeChat public account disclosed the corruption path of Liu Xiaoping, the former deputy party secretary and president of Zizhong County Traditional Chinese Medicine Hospital in Neijiang. From "saying hello" in hospital procurement to "sharing dividends" in engineering construction, he accepted all orders regardless of the amount or property.  

;

;Liu Xiaoping not only charges "thank you fees" for purchasing drugs and medical equipment, but even the field of engineering construction has become a "nursing place" for him to make money.  

;

;In 2009, when the Zizhong County People's Hospital was building a new inpatient building, the project owner Peng Mou promised to share a certain amount of profits with Liu Xiaoping after the project was completed in the name of "buying shares" to jointly undertake the construction. The project progress payment was disbursed as scheduled, and Liu Xiaoping received the first "shareholding dividend" of 600,000 yuan. In the following five years, Liu Xiao would receive an average "dividend" each time the project progress payment was disbursed, totaling 2.8 million yuan.  

;

;Subsequently, Liu Xiaoping accepted everything from a pack of cigarettes and a few bottles of wine to 10,000 to 20,000 yuan in cash to hundreds of thousands of yuan in cash, no matter the amount or the amount of property. From 2008 to 2021, Liu Xiaoping took advantage of his position to make a lot of money in drug procurement, engineering construction, etc., providing convenience for others to allocate funds for drugs, medical equipment, medical equipment, and engineering funds, and accepting gifts from others. The total amount of cash received was 17.587 million yuan, and the cumulative amount received in violation of disciplines and laws reached 20.1209 million yuan.

;

;On September 14 this year, the "Integrity Sichuan" WeChat public account announced that Zhang Dejun, former deputy secretary of the Party Committee and president of Deyang Second People's Hospital, had seriously violated discipline and law and was expelled from the party and public office.  

;

;The report pointed out that Zhang Dejun accepted gifts and gifts that may affect the fair execution of official duties, was passive and slack in his work, was superficial, and had problems with formalism and bureaucracy; violated organizational principles, and acted inappropriately during the recruitment of employees. Seeking benefits for others and not truthfully explaining problems when organizing inquiries; owning shares in unlisted companies and engaging in money and sex transactions; being indifferent to the masses and apportioning expenses to enterprises in violation of regulations; incorrectly performing duties, interfering and intervening in construction project contracting; ethics Corruption and pursuit of vulgar taste; turning public power into a tool for personal gain, willing to be "hunted", taking advantage of the convenience of one's position to seek benefits for others and accept property in aspects such as medical equipment procurement, medical consumables procurement, employee recruitment and recruitment, etc. , a huge amount.
